actions.name: Clip
actions.description: Opens the New Document Assistant, pre- filled with the provided data.

parameters.name: destination
parameters.description: The UUID of a group or database where the item shall be created. If the 'destination' parameter is not specified the item is created in the global inbox.

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: The title of the item to be created.

parameters.name: comment
parameters.description: A comment to be added to the item.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The URL linking to the content, e.g., the URL of the website for the bookmark or the image.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of tags to be attached to the created item.

parameters.name: flagged
parameters.description: marks or unmarks the item as flagged

parameters.name: unread
parameters.description: marks or unmarks item as unread

parameters.name: label
parameters.description: Sets the item's label (0-based index or name of the label).

parameters.name: uuid
parameters.description: The UUID of the item, e.g., derived from an item link

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: Base64-encoded file data to be set as the item's new content. The source and text parameters are mutually exclusive with source taking precedence if both are present.

parameters.name: destination
parameters.description: The UUID of a group or database where the item shall be moved to. You can only provide one destination; if the item was previously replicated to more than one group it will be unlinked from all of them and placed into the new group.

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: Text content to be set for the document. The source and text parameters are mutually exclusive with source taking precedence if both are present.

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: A new title for the item.

parameters.name: comment
parameters.description: A comment to be set in the item's metadata.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: A URL to be set in the item's metadata.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of tags to be added to the item. If the item was already tagged the previous tags are removed and the new set of tags is added.

parameters.name: flagged
parameters.description: marks or unmarks the item flagged

parameters.name: unread
parameters.description: marks or unmarks item as unread

parameters.name: label
parameters.description: Sets the item's label (0-based index or name of the label).
